Congratulations to Gretna's Perneice L. White, 1 of 18 named a #CarnegieHero for freeing a man trapped inside a burning truck. White removed him through an open window, dragged him away from the truck, and put out flames on his legs.
 https://www.carnegiehero.org/perneice-l-white …
@carnegie_hero
#VA05

In honor of Scottsburg's Troy E. Strickland, 1 of 18 named a #CarnegieHero for attempting to save girl from drowning. Despite severe ocean conditions, Strickland swam toward her. Upon removal from water, he was unable to be revived. 
 https://www.carnegiehero.org/troy-e-strickland …
@carnegie_hero
#VA05
